text: Thank you for this info, we’ll take a look when we can. We do have a engineering-wide event this week and we’ll all be OOO next week, so it’s likely that you won’t hear much from us until July 8.

Hi <@U06254DHHAP> thank you for letting us know! Could you try the listing endpoint again and see if the flows show up? I believe it was a bug in our filtering logic.

I'll take a look into the failed creates, but it might be a bit delayed as Paul has mentioned, thank you!

Thank you Minsu! All of the flows seem to be returning now, for 23775335 all 32 are returned - including those with duplicate names.

The newly created flows are also returning for 46589107.

I really appreciate the update, enjoy PEER week and the week of rest!
